text: Bactriola paupercula is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1885. It is known from Bolivia and Panama.BioLib.cz - Bactriola paupercula. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Bactriola paupercula
